StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEduca.onCer..ca.onsByEdLvl]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Educa.onLevel varchar(2) AS
SELECT -1 AS ID, EC.EDUCATION_CODE AS Code, CASE WHEN EC.EDUCATION_CODE = 'H' AND ELC.EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE = '11' THEN 'HOME SCHOOL SENIOR' ELSE EC.EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION END + CASE WHEN EC.EDUCATION_CODE IN ('Y', 'Z') THEN ' TIER ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(1), (SELECT [dbo].[EDUCATION_TIER].EDUCATION_TIER FROM [dbo].[EDUCATION_TIER] WHERE [dbo].[EDUCATION_TIER].EDUCATION_CODE = EC.EDUCATION_CODE)) ELSE SPACE(0) END AS Descrip.on, EC.TYPE AS Usage FROM [dbo].[EDUCATION_CODE] EC WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE] ELC ON (EC.EDUCATION_CODE = ELC.EDUCATION_CODE AND ELC.EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE = @Educa.onLevel AND --- .lter out "MIGRATION_PROBLEM" --- AND EC.EDUCATION_CODE <> 'X' EC.EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION != 'MIGRATION PROBLEMS') ORDER BY EC.EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION
